meanings.definition: A person who takes part in an insurrection.
meanings.sent1: The insurrectionists gathered in the square to plan their rebellion.
meanings.sent2: The insurrectionists were arrested for their involvement in the violent uprising.
meanings.sent3: The insurrectionists tried to overthrow the government but ended up getting lost in the city.
meanings.sent4: The insurrectionists were like a swarm of angry bees, buzzing with defiance.
meanings.sent5: The image of the insurrectionists storming the capitol will forever be etched in history.

meanings.definition: Members of a group that rebels against authority.
meanings.sent1: The insurrectionists demanded change and stood up against the rulers.
meanings.sent2: The insurrectionists were determined to challenge the oppressive regime.
meanings.sent3: The insurrectionists decided to rebel by painting the town square pink.
meanings.sent4: The insurrectionists were a force of nature, shaking the foundations of power.
meanings.sent5: The insurrectionists' defiance echoed through the halls of the palace.
